public interface DeviceManager

Interface for the users registry.

Andres Rodriguez.

Method Detail

findOrCreate

DeviceEntity findOrCreate(UserEntity user,
                          DeviceType type,
                          String name,
                          String description,
                          boolean layout,
                          Integer width)
                          throws PMSException
Finds a device by name, creating it if it does not exist.

Parameters:
user - The user creating the device.
type - Device type.
name - Device name.
description - Device description.
layout - Whether the device has layout.
width - Layout width.
Returns:
The found or created device.
Throws:
PMSException

load

DevicesObject load(UUID envId)
Loads the registered devices.

Parameters:
envId - Environment Id.
Returns:
The collection of registered devices.
